issue.title: drc_practice_task_7.launch all of the valves have fallen off of the wall

content.raw:
@mdedonato
can you try the drcsim-prerelease 4.1.7 and see if the problem is fixed?

~~~
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install drcsim-prerelease
~~~

or download [deb from here](http://old.gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/).

Also, as a side note, see minor issues related to the valves [here](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/issue/24/drc-practice-task-7-wheel-valve-large-mode)
